textAfterTable: Introducing the beautiful Surya Happy Cottage HC5811 throw rug. With a series of striking designs that will sweep up your room in vibrant, upbeat charm, the Happy Cottage collection by Country Living for Surya is everything you've been searching for your home dTcor and so much more! Hand woven in 100% wool, a series of divine stripe patterns in marvelous multicoloring allow each of these perfect pieces to craft a look that will not only pop within your home, but also radiate a sense subtle, smooth sophistication. Some of the colors in this rug are - Pink, Hot Pink, Hot Pink, Cherry, Ivory and the Pantone colors are 11-0606, 19-1655, 17-1740. The style of this rug is Geometric and the material is .
